topic.title: Minimalistic Music Pirating ZeroSite!
topic.body:
Everyone! Just made a tiny music pirating site, feel free to
check it out. currently I'm trying to get a .bit domain for it so
i would be very thankful if anyone could help me out to get one :)
Currently it has only few popular [of all time] albums in it but
if you think there should be a album which isn't feel free to
leave down a comment and i'll post on it quickly (due to high
caffeine usage i aprox. sleep 2-3 hours a day so due to that ability (xD)
torrents will be posted shortly after commenting (and getting approved))

After all, any and all Suggestions,
recommendations, and ideas are much appreciated! :D

Album Pirate:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/15rxrWApXJL921SWjQNySF1tpLsWKR2qVs

topic.title: Is there any CMS that ZeroMe does support?
topic.body: Do you know any CMS that has Search and Upload feature and might run on ZeroNet?

topic.title: Need Hi-Speed Seeder For Your Website? POST IT HERE!
topic.body:
Hi there,
As ZeroNet's community is awesome and i personally love it,
decided to help people who'll need a high speed 24/7 seed for their websites.
So feel free to comment your website down below and i'll be adding it to SeedBox ASAP! :D

(Currently due to storage difficulties it's not possible to seed big files, but if this went popular
and could really help to improve ZeroNet and its community i'll be upgrading the SeedBox storage)


SeedBox specs:
Board: Raspberry Pi 2 Super-Overclocked
Storage: 8GB Class 10 Sandisk Micro SD
(Possibly gonna add another 1TB to it if current storage was not enough)
Connection: Fiber-Optic 80Mbps DL/ 40Mbps UL Unlimited Bandwidth (Ucom)
Ping Time: 50ms From SeedBox (ARM) to Google Servers (USA)
Location: Yerevan, Armenia

topic.title: Site Creation - Renaming Own Websites
topic.body:
As i'm trying to improve my minimalistic album pirate website
I've noticed that it needs to be renamed to be more identical on the ZeroHello (ZeroNet Homepage) side bar and in the title, but how should i rename it?

topic.title: ZeroNet Improvisation - UI Translations
topic.body:
How can it be done?
1) At the first place is there any way to translate ZeroNet UI and dependent sites?
2) Is there any way that people with no-coding skills could easily translate them into other languages?
3) Idea (would make a ZeroNet more user-firendly ): Categorizing Communities based on their Language (e.g. Hungarian ZeroTalk) with small flag icon on ZeroHello (ZeroNet Homepage) side bar beside site name for non-english sites/communities

topic.title: Got Raspberry Pi Bro? [SeedBox Tutorial]
topic.body:
As the one of the most important material of any community is helping each other and spreading love and information, building a 24/7 seed box would help our ZeroNet community become better and better over time. So if you have a Raspberry Pi and a good internet connection (>4Mbps) grab 'em and connect 'em together and follow the instructions and help improving ZeroNet and our world :D (I'm not responsible for any broken toasters, broken balls or hair losses)

Paste all of these into Terminal one-by-one and if any error occurred comment down below:
1) sudo apt-get update
2) sudo apt-get install msgpack-python python-gevent
3) wget https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/archive/master.tar.gz
4) tar xvpfz master.tar.gz
5) cd ZeroNet-master
6) echo 'deb http://deb.torproject.org/torproject.org jessie main'>> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/tor.list
7) gpg --keyserver keys.gnupg.net --recv 886DDD89
8) gpg --export A3C4F0F979CAA22CDBA8F512EE8CBC9E886DDD89 | apt-key add -
9) apt-get update
10) apt-get install tor
11) sudo nano mcedit /etc/tor/torrc

Here you have to do some work manually:
Find and remove the # character from lines "ControlPort 9051" and "CookieAuthentication 1"

12)  /etc/init.d/tor restart
13) usermod -a -G debian-tor [YourUsernameHere]
14) sudo reboot
15) cd ZeroNet-master
16) sudo apt-get install ufw
17) sudo ufw allow 9051
18) python python zeronet.py --ui_ip "*" --ui_password [SomePassword]

Now it's done!
Access it via [RaspberryPiLocalIP]:43110
and now if it asks for password just put in the password which you've set in step 18

19) Open up some websites to start seeding them automatically.
20) Keep it up and running as much as possible and be happy because you're helping the community a lot :)

If some error occurred or simply had any question feel free to comment it down below and i'll be replying ASAP :)

topic.title: Retro ZeroGaming - Old-School Games On Zeronet
topic.body:
Digger: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1EivSCidYeLGvq6oUYsyVuv7Xgumbts1Zt/
Mario Infinite: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Cd69AC8hLq79SZyDDm29FeneYfFwyyYb6/
Pacman: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LcsMa1KCZ8sDgkXqMQjfZdnB9iZWh61Qk/


None of these are fully diagnosed/tested so you might have some errors
in that case feel free to comment it down below :)

1_1CHcEy3SYsQvrW9uskKTZxUWj97BmZmvfa.body:
> [kosherx](#comment_4_1Kkc5j5xrEJevvV6sBqCrW93dscMVGbcDY): Is it going to support uploads?

I'll do my best to make uploads possible.

> [oracle](#comment_193_1ED3Ho3kmzaKiECtyuqSjDpoE47rKuXeP): When I click on a magnet link, a small window appears and it says - Problem loading page Remote XUL This page uses an unsupported technology that is no longer available by default in Firefox.  Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.

Yeah right, unfortunately Firefox dosen't support Remote XUL anymore,
if you wanna do a quick fix just copy its link address and simply paste it into your BitTorrent
client. But if you wanna be able to click-and-download have a look at this forum page:
https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/988346

> [kopykate](#comment_52_16w7UuJAHbt8YBa8zxHS7UFk9mq8Q5DpE4): It will eventually need a search engine, but so far so good. You should be able to simply copy the code of either Play, ZeroTorrent or even the code on my site.

How? Is there any unofficial website cloning way?

2_1CHcEy3SYsQvrW9uskKTZxUWj97BmZmvfa.body:
> [nofish](#comment_794_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): You can search in ZeroMe using the homepage. Image upload is planned later.

i meant a CMS for site creation like wordpress, joomla etc. (sorry for not clarifying it in the first post)

> [nofish](#comment_795_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Nothing zeronet specific yet, but any static file generator should work: https://www.staticgen.com/

Thank you

1_16w7UuJAHbt8YBa8zxHS7UFk9mq8Q5DpE4.body: I appreciate the whole thing it's cool and awesome. It would be very nice if you could add a basic video title/description/thumbnail editing features or at least a post deleting option to avoid some possible redundancies, to reduce possible mistakes and to increase content quality and user ease.
